help.COMMANDS:
Commands are tied to prefixes [ ?(get), +(set), -(del), ~(sync) ]
Setup your channel settings with ~~<field> <value>
Query your channel settings with ??channel
Get possible fields in a sheet with ??<sheet>
help.GET:
Get sheet data with prefix [ ? ]
?<sheet> <field> <value>

Or to learn more about the sheet, try:
??<sheet>
help.SET:
Add or update sheet data with prefix [ + ]
Try:
+<sheet> <field> <value>

Or to learn more about the sheet, try:
??<sheet>
help.DEL:
Delete sheet data with prefix [ - ]
Try:
-<sheet> <field> <value>

Or to learn more about the sheet, try:
??<sheet>
help.SYNC:
Sync specific sheets with prefix [ ~ ]
Try:
~<sheet> <guildID>

messages.HELLO: Hello %s! Welcome to the shit show!

error.NO_DM: I can't run this query through DM
error.NO_SPREADSHEET: This channel is not setup with a spreadsheet
error.NO_PERMISSION: You do not have permission to use this command
error.NO_GUILDID: Your guildID needs to be a number
error.NO_CONDITIONS: This command does not use conditions
error.RESULTS_TOO_LONG:
**The results of this request are too long**
**try again with more details**

Or to learn more about the sheet, try:
??<sheet>

error.DEL_HELP:
